verbose_text: XREF_BIBR The duo NKX6-2 and NKX6-1 has been extensively studied in the context of class II homeodomain transcription factors, which are induced by SHH (MIM : 600725) in the course of neural-tube patterning to confer ventral progenitor cell identities.
